Package gw.api.bean.compare

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Diff<T extends Object>
    Represents the difference or lack thereof between two things: an old thing (the "source" value), and a new thing (the "compare" value). It is normally used to represent difference data that is fed to the user interface. For Policy Refresh, the graph of differences is stored as a tree of gw.api.tree.TreeNode TreeNodes, and each TreeNode stores a Diff as its "data" (accessed through gw.api.tree.TreeNode#getData()).
    DiffImpl<T extends Object>  
    EntityDiff<T extends KeyableBean>  
    EntityDiffImpl<T extends KeyableBean>  
    EntityMatch<T extends KeyableBean>
    Represents the fact that two instances of KeyableBean have been "matched", which indicates that both instances represent the same bean, but where the new instance ("compare") may or may not have changes versus the old instance ("source"). The CC Policy Refresh feature creates instances of this interface to represent corresponding beans in the old and new policy graphs, where the instance under the old policy is the "source" and the corresponding instance under the new policy is the "compare".
    EntityMatchImpl<T extends KeyableBean>
    EntityMatcher<T extends KeyableBean>
    Interface for matching two different entity instances to determine if they logically represent the same entity. Semantics are identical to <code>gw.api.diff.BeanMatcher#doBeansMatch(gw.pl.persistence.core.entity.KeyableBean, gw.pl.persistence.core.entity.KeyableBean) BeanMatcher</code>.
    InitializableMatcher
    Optional interface for implementations of EntityMatcher that need additional information from the context of the matching, i.e. to find a matcher for a different type.
    InitializableMatcherBase<T extends KeyableBean>
    Base implementation for EntityMatcher matchers} that need to logically match on other related entity types.
    MatcherBase<T extends KeyableBean>
    Base implementation of EntityMatcher that defines common utility methods for comparison.
    MatcherContext
    The context of an entity matching (EntityMatcher ).
    PropertyDiff<T extends Object>
    Represents a property difference.
    PropertyDiffImpl<T extends Object>  
    PropertyMatchPrioritizer<T extends KeyableBean>
    <code>Comparator</code> for prioritizing matches between beans based on the values of particular properties. An instance of this class is created for a particular reference bean, and then it is used to compare how well other beans match that bean. It is assumed, but not verified, that all beans passed to <code>compare(gw.pl.persistence.core.entity.KeyableBean, gw.pl.persistence.core.entity.KeyableBean)</code> actually do match the reference bean.
